game.name: Knives
game.description:
Every player seeks for new fun and thrill after sometime. Today we have brought to you a brand new action-packed challenge where you spot plenty of entertainment possibilities in just a few clicks. Are you ready to take on this challenge and show off the world that you are also expert at shooting with a weapon like knife? Join Knives game and enjoy hitting all targets by putting your knife throwing skills to test! All you need to do is just throwing knife at everybody you see on the screen. 
 
There are plenty of stages to be cleared in this one of the best shooting games for kids. Use the knife you will be given at the first stage and focus on how to clear further multiple stages! If you hit the target successfully, it will help you earn some points that will allow you to unlock new and advanced knives further. It means that there are plenty of advanced knives to explore. It is up to you how you wisely you play to cut the fruit using your knife. 
On the top left corner of the screen, you can see the details of your score. It will be easy to know which stage you are presently in by looking at the middle top corner of the screen. If you feel get bored, feel free to browse through our extensive variety of other top action games and learn which shooting game will suit you the most. We at atmegame.com maintain a wide array of fun skill games for boys and girls where there you can easily keep you busy without download games.
